meanings.definition: A member of a labor union that represents workers in the transportation industry.
meanings.sent1: The teamsters negotiated for better pay and working conditions.
meanings.sent2: The teamsters gathered to discuss their concerns about safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The teamsters joked that their union meetings felt like a family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The teamsters were the backbone of the labor movement, standing strong for their rights.
meanings.sent5: The teamsters proudly wore their union badges, showing solidarity with their fellow workers.

meanings.definition: A group of workers who are organized to work together as a team, especially in the transportation industry.
meanings.sent1: The teamsters loaded the trucks efficiently to meet the delivery deadline.
meanings.sent2: The teamsters collaborated seamlessly to unload the cargo from the ship.
meanings.sent3: The teamsters decided to have a friendly competition to see who could pack the truck fastest.
meanings.sent4: The teamsters moved in perfect harmony, like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The teamsters cheered each other on as they worked together to achieve their goal.
